CustomProperties.Tooltip: Padding of the logo image

CustomProperties.Tooltip: Show / Hide the user details in the header.

CustomProperties.Tooltip: Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for font color and icon color of user name and icon.

CustomProperties.Tooltip: Show or hide a title in the header.

CustomProperties.Tooltip: The text used as header title.

CustomProperties.Tooltip: Table used for building up the navigation menu. Every item needs to have a property for navigation item title and a target screen to navigate to for the menu to work.

CustomProperties.Name: WrapTitleText
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Wrap the header titles.

CustomProperties.Name: ActiveIndicatorColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Color of the line indicating the currently active menu item

CustomProperties.Name: ActiveFontColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Font color of the currently active menu item

CustomProperties.Name: InactiveFontColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Font color of menu items currently inactive

CustomProperties.Name: MenuFill
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Fill color of both the horizontal and vertical menu

CustomProperties.Name: MenuHeight
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Use this property to set the height of the menu elements instead of the 'regular' height property to support flexible height of the menu to show or hide the vertical menu element.

CustomProperties.Name: ComponentHeight
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Calculated height of the component based on if secondary menu is shown or hidden. Used as input for the Height property of the component.

CustomProperties.Name: IconColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Icon color of ellipses and hamburger icon in text format (css or hex) to allow use for both icons.

CustomProperties.Name: FontColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for font color and icon color of user name, phone, address and icons.

CustomProperties.Name: TitleColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for font color of titles

CustomProperties.Name: FillColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for fill color of Footer.

CustomProperties.Name: FooterTitle
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Used to change the text of footer Title.

CustomProperties.Name: Column1Title
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Used to change the Title of first column.

CustomProperties.Name: Column1Description
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Used to change the description of first column.

CustomProperties.Name: Column1ShowImage
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Allows to show/hide image of the column.

CustomProperties.Name: Column2Title
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Used to change the Title of second column.

CustomProperties.Name: Column2Description
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Used to change the description of second column.

CustomProperties.Name: Column2ShowImage
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Allows to show/hide image of the column.

CustomProperties.Name: Column3Title
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Used to change the Title of third column.

CustomProperties.Name: Column3Description
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Used to change the description of third column.

CustomProperties.Name: Column3ShowImage
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Allows to show/hide image of the column.

CustomProperties.Name: ArrowColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for fill color of arrows.

CustomProperties.Name: FontColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for fill color of font.

CustomProperties.Name: FillColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for fill color of Icon..

CustomProperties.Name: Title
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Changes title of the icon

CustomProperties.Name: FontSize
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Allows to control font size.

CustomProperties.Name: ShowTitle
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Hides/unhides title

CustomProperties.Name: ButtonWidth
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Used to edit the width of the button.

CustomProperties.Name: ButtonHeight
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Used to edit the height of the button.

CustomProperties.Name: IconSize
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Allows you to change the size of the icon

CustomProperties.Name: Position
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Positioning of the text and icon.

CustomProperties.Name: ArrowType
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Type of icon arrow to use. Insert arrow or chevron.

CustomProperties.Name: FlipArrow
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //flips arrows direction. Insert true or false.

CustomProperties.Name: InactiveIconColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for color of Inactive Icon.

CustomProperties.Name: ActiveIconColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for color of Active Icon.

CustomProperties.Name: ShowhidePlusIcon
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Shows or hides + icon.

CustomProperties.Name: HintText
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Used to edit the hint text.

CustomProperties.Name: ShowhideDropdown
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Shows/hides dropdown menu.

CustomProperties.Name: DropDownMenuItems
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Allows to edit the items of dropdown menu.

CustomProperties.Name: SearchBoxFillColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Used to edit the fill color of search box.

CustomProperties.Name: SelectionFillColor
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Used to edit the fill color of selection.

CustomProperties.Name: ShowhideShadow
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Shows/hides shadow.

CustomProperties.Name: ButtonText
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Text property of the Button control

CustomProperties.Name: ButtonEnabled
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Enabled property of the Button control

CustomProperties.Name: PrimaryButton
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Primary property of the Button control

CustomProperties.Name: ButtonTooltip
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Tooltip property of the Button control

CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for font color of done step text.

CustomProperties.Name: FontColorCurrent
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for font color of current step text.

CustomProperties.Name: FontColorToDo
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for font color of to do step text.

CustomProperties.Name: FillColorDone
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for fill color of done step text.

CustomProperties.Name: FillColorCurrent
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for fill color of current step text.

CustomProperties.Name: FillColorToDo
CustomProperties.Tooltip: //Color code in text (css / hex) to allow use for fill color of to do step text.
